EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to those YP who got an email in error
EmailTemplate.name: Apology email - 16/05/16
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry about the confusion!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are very sorry if you have received an email from us that made no sense!
The lovely Joel in our system's team is updating the HeadStart database and it appears whilst doing so, some very old emails have been triggered that shouldn't have. So, on behalf of everyone here at HeadStart, we are very sorry!
If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to email us or send us a message on facebook, twitter or instagram and we will get back to you as soon as we can.
Have a great day!
